244490.「お前さん それ以上 持ちきれんようじゃな。\n どうぐかばんを整理して また来:
I think you're a bit short for room on
carrying things. You should clean out your

<end>

<%sM_CAPSULE_NAME>, I see.
Would you like to trade <%dM_DOUBLY_POINT> Doubly Points
for it?
<yesno2>
<case 1><close>

<case_cancel><break>
<case_end>

<yesno2>
<case 1><close>
<case 2><break>
<case_cancel><break>
<case_end>

244495.「どのパックの カプセルが\n ほしいんじゃ？\n<break>:

244496.「ダブリィポイントを 何に使うのかの？\n ニャンコインか お前さんの好きなカプ:
You can use your Doubly Points for either
Cat Coins or a toy of your choice. It's up

<break>

244497.「ニャンコインが 必要になったら\n ちいさなメダルを たくさん持って\n また:
If you ever need more Cat Coins, be sure to

<end>

The Cat Coin sale ends on the 11th at
05:59 JST. Don't miss out on it!
<end>

244499.「今 新しいパックを 準備しているところでな。\n うまくいけば <tm%nM_:
I'm getting a new pack ready. I'm hoping to
add it by Meow Meow Day soon, so please
look forward to it!
<end>

244500.「む……。回収できるカプセルを\n 持っていないようじゃな。\n ガニャポンで手:
Mmm...you don't have any toys on you. The
capsule toys from Catshapon are what I'm
interested in.
<bw_break>

244501.「ちいさなメダルが 足りんようじゃ。\n ニャンコインと 交換するには\n <%:
You don't have enough Mini Medals. I'll need
<%dM_COIN_MEDAL> of them to exchange for Cat Coins.
Sorry about that.
<bw_break>

244503.「お前さん それ以上 持ちきれんようじゃな。\n どうぐかばんを整理して また来:

<case 2><break>
<case_cancel><break>

244508.「ちいさなメダル <%nM_COIN_SALE_OUT>枚で\n ニャンコイン:
For every <%dM_COIN_SALE_OUT> Mini Medals, I'll
give you 5 Cat Coins with a bonus 2 thrown in,

<yesno>

<case_cancel><break>
<case_end>

244509.「お前さんや。\n ちょろまかそうとしちゃあ いかんよ。\n きちんと ちいさな:
Hey, what are you trying to pull here?
You'll need Mini Medals for that.
<bw_break>

244510.「ニャンコインを 何個 ほしいのじゃ？\n ダブリィポイント <%nM_COIN:
How many Cat Coins would you like?
You can exchange <%dM_COIN_DOUBLY> Doubly Points
for 1 Cat Coin.
<break>

244511.「ニャンコイン <%nM_NUM>個 じゃな？\n ダブリィポイント <%nM_:
Nyancoins <%nM_NUM>, right? It'll be
exchanged for <%nM_COST> Doubly Points, if
that's okay with you.<yesno>
<case 1><close>
<case 2><break>
<case_cancel><break>
<case_end>

244513.「ちまたでは ネコが 大人気らしくてのう。 \n いろいろな姿と色をしたネコの:
Cats seem to be all the rage here, eh? I thought it'd be a good idea to hand out cat Pets of all shapes and sizes.
But what fun would that be? Wouldn't it be more fun if what you got was a surprise instead?
That's why I used alchemy to create this machine capable of dispensing Pet capsule toys. I call it "Catshapon".
I'll keep making more Pets and spread my name far and wide, and I'll continue to research how to perfect magical creatures forever!

244514.「ガニャポンを使うのに 必要なコインじゃ。\n ちいさなメダル <%nM_COI:
You need Coins to use the Catshapon machine. Give me <%dM_COIN_MEDAL> Mini Medals and I'll give you 1 Cat Coin.
The Medal Owner will exchange lots of things for Mini Medals. What is it I want, you ask? Well...that's my secret!

244515.「もしも すでに 手に入れたカプセルや\n こいつは いらんというカプセルが 出:
If you come across any capsule toys you already own or any that you don't want, rest assured that I will take them off your hands.
In exchange for them, I'll give you Doubly Points. These points can be exchanged for Cat Coins or a capsule toy of your choosing!

244516.「わしは おのれの意思を持ち 自由に行動する \n 完全なる魔法生物を作ることを:
I seek to create a perfect magical creatureーone that acts freely and of its own will. All so I can catch up to *them*...
For now, though...the best I'm able to manage are Pets, those little creatures that wander along behind their owners.
But I'll never give up! I WILL create the perfect magical creature one dayーeven more perfect than Hana, something *they* created!
Oh, that's right! If you have any Pet capsules, please give them to an Elf man named Karuta in Azlan.
He can open the capsules to release the Pets inside. He should be able to tell you how to use them, too.

244517.「ほほう 勉強熱心じゃな。感心 感心。\n 何について 聞きたいのじゃ？\n<b:
Hoho, quite studious, I see.
What are you interested in hearing about?
<break>

244518.「他にも 何か 聞きたいことは あるかの？\n<break>:

about?
<break>

<%dM_NUM> <%sM_CAPSULE_NAME>, yes?
